# API Instructions

> This is a reference file for GitHub Copilot.
> The authoritative version is maintained at `.ai/standards/api/design.md`

## Quick Rules

- **RESTful:** Standard HTTP methods and status codes
- **Validation:** Input validation on all endpoints
- **Errors:** Consistent error response format

## Full Standards

For complete API design standards, see:
- **Primary source:** [.ai/standards/api/design.md](../../.ai/standards/api/design.md)

Apply these standards to all API code in this project.

---

**Note:** This file exists for GitHub Copilot compatibility. All updates should be made to `.ai/standards/api/design.md` which is the single source of truth.
